x x x ummān x+x x x x x x x x x x x+x ummānī ma ka x x x x x x x x šumma ina šumēl marti išpallurtu x x x x x x x x x x-šu₂ ne ti ka x x x x x x x x x x rīdûtu ku-x x x x x x x x x x x kiššatu x x x x x+x x x x x x+x piṭru ana kakki x+x x x x x x x x-an mār bārta u x x x x x x x x x x-kad sa-ti x x x x x x x x x x x x x ki DU₈ x x x x x x x x x x x x Tašritu ūm 08-KAM limmu Bel-Harran-šadduʾa Ilu-ṣabtanni mār {1}x-x-ba-ni {1}x x x mār Marduk-šumu-uṣur bārê bēlē ṭēme
